pkgmetadata.longdescription: Download NRCS Data // Downloads Natural Resources Conservation Service (NRCS) data for sites in the Soil Climate Analysis Network (SCAN) https://www.wcc.nrcs.usda.gov/scan/, and Snow Telemetry (SNOTEL and SNOLITE) https://www.wcc.nrcs.usda.gov/snow/ networks. Metadata can be returned for all sites in the NRCS' Air and Water Data Base (AWDB) https://www.wcc.nrcs.usda.gov/report_generator/AWDB_Netw ork_Codes.pdf.
